item.title: 2022-03-14: Toledo City Council Meeting - AARP Sign
item.description: Denise was on the agenda and presented an update to the Toledo City Council. Part of her information included an update regarding AARP funding which requires the addition of an attribution sign. A preliminary design for such a sign is included below. Previous Next     Page: /

item.title: 2022-Jan-4: Meeting Minutes and Attachments
item.description: This is information from our Zoom call today. Please take a moment to look it over before Thursday’s meeting at the Wieting at 5 p.m. Denise —– Forwarded Message —– From: “Jon D Werger” WergerJ@wellmark.com To: “ldfletcher” ldfletcher@mchsi.com Sent: Tuesday, January 4, 2022 1:56:01 PM Subject: Healthy Hometown information Denise, Thank you for hosting today’s call, I enjoyed learning more about Toledo and Tama and the work you are doing. Attached, for your review is……
